## ClassMembersMap.moveStatementsToMembers() method

Move statements from a sequence of statement maps to the class members.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveStatementsToMembers(statementsMaps: ClassFieldStatementsMap[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statementsMaps | [ClassFieldStatementsMap](./ts-morph-structures.classfieldstatementsmap.md)<!-- -->\[\] | the statements to apply to each member, ordered by purpose. |

**Returns:**

void
